Name: Cover An Ally
Effect: Target One Ally. Priority 1. The User will become the Target for incoming attacks towards the Target. This Cover lasts until the User's Next Turn or until the Target uses a Non-Ranged Physical Move. Pok√©mon with Loyalty 2 or less won't use this Maneuver.
Description: No time to think. Use your body as a shield to protect your friends! Not even 100 Spearrows will go through you!
